#include <stdio.h> 
#ifndef ONLINE_JUDGE
#define gc getchar
#else
#define gc getchar_unlocked
#endif
inline long long int read_int()
{
    char c = gc();
    while(c<'0' || c>'9')
    c = gc();
    long long int ret = 0;
    while(c>='0' && c<='9')
    {
    ret = (ret<<3) + (ret<<1) + c - 48;
    c = gc();
    }
    return ret;
}
long long int gcd(long long int a,long long int b)
{
    long long int temp;
    while(b)
    {
		temp = a;
		a = b;
		b = temp%b;
    }
    return a;
}
/*
long long int gcd(long long int x, int long long y) {
  if (x == 0) {
    return y;
  }
 
  while (y != 0) {
    if (x > y) {
      x = x - y;
    }
    else {
      y = y - x;
    }
  }
 
  return x;
}
*/
int main() 
{
long long int hcf, lcm;
long long int n,t,i,x,y;
scanf("%lld",&n);

long long int a[n+4];
for(i=1;i<=n;i++)
{
//scanf("%lld",&a[i]);
a[i]=read_int();
}
scanf("%lld",&t);
while(t--)
{
  //scanf("%lld %lld",&x,&y);
	x=read_int();
	y=read_int();  
hcf = gcd(a[x], a[y]);
  lcm = (a[x]*a[y])/hcf;
  printf("%lld\n",lcm);
}
return 0;
}
